channel.title: How to add? MORE EXP TO MOnster
channel.description: How do i add more exp when u kill a monster please SOME 1 GUIDE ME through WHAT FILE and what i should type? or search for in the file--help

item.title: How to add? MORE EXP TO MOnster
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

the 1000*hitdiff is what you change. the 1000 is how much xp you get a hit so if you change to like 400, if you hit a 2 you will gain 800 xp.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add? MORE EXP TO MOnster
item.dc:creator: @wildof_death wildof death
item.description:
@wildof_death wrote:

where do i add i don’t understand this is what i have?

inCombat();
if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
{
TotalExp = (double) (1000 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
} else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive

Read full topic

item.title: How to add? MORE EXP TO MOnster
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

wow yugioh stop posting dumb things, you don’t know how to code or how to spell. that doesn’t help with what he needs and it is spelled addskillxp.

Go to client.java and search for totalexp until you find e.g 100* just change that number to what you want the amount of exp per damage you receive.

Read full topic
